item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost:8000.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
LCBO Alliston Mills Shopping Centre

Directions

Address: Hwy 89 Young 36 Street, Alliston Mills Shopping Centre, L9R 1P8

Store Features:

-Same-Day Pickup

-Parking Available

-Wheelchair Accessible

-Vintages Section

-Product Consultant Available

-Cold Beer Room

Phone number: (705) 435-7332

Hours:

Monday-Saturday

10am-9pm

Sunday

11am-6pm

The LCBO Alliston Mills Shopping Centre is a retail location of the Liquor Control Board of Ontario (LCBO), a provincial Crown corporation established in 1927 to oversee the sale and distribution of beverage alcohol in Ontario. Located in the Alliston Mills Shopping Centre, this store serves the Alliston community and nearby areas with a broad selection of wines, beers, spirits, and ready-to-drink products.

As part of one of the world’s largest alcohol retailers, the Alliston LCBO offers access to both domestic and international brands. The store features a modern layout designed for easy browsing, along with knowledgeable staff who assist customers in selecting products for everyday enjoyment and special occasions. Its convenient placement within a busy shopping centre makes it a central and dependable shopping destination for the community.

item.title: Tequila Don Julio Blanco
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
Category: Spirits → Tequila → Blanco

Price: $82.25

Bottle Size: 750 mL

Alcohol Content: 40%

Origin: Mexico (Region Not Specified)

Style: Vibrant & Fruity

Description

Tequila Don Julio Blanco is a premium, unaged tequila crafted from 100% blue agave. Crystal clear in appearance, it delivers lively aromas of fresh agave, citrus, lemon, lime, and grapefruit. The palate is smooth and dry, featuring light agave sweetness, subtle grassy notes, and a touch of black pepper, finishing clean and refreshing.

Serving Suggestion

This tequila is ideal for elevated cocktails such as a Blanco Luxury Margarita, combining Don Julio Blanco with fresh lime juice and agave nectar. It also pairs well with soft grilled chicken tacos.

Availability

In Stock at LCBO Alliston, Ontario.

item.title: Tequila Don Julio Reposado
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
Category: Spirits → Tequila → Reposado

Price: $87.25

Bottle Size: 750 mL

Alcohol Content: 40%

Origin: Mexico (Region Not Specified)

Style: Warm & Spicy

Description

Tequila Don Julio Reposado is aged for eight months in white American oak barrels, giving it a rich golden colour and refined character. The aroma features citrus, stone fruit, and spice, while the palate is smooth and elegant with flavours of pear, dark chocolate, vanilla, cinnamon, and dried fruit. The finish is warm, silky, and well-balanced.

Serving Suggestion

This reposado tequila is excellent for sipping or enjoying in a Reposado Paloma, blended with fresh grapefruit juice, lime juice, agave nectar, and soda water.

Availability

In stock at LCBO Alliston, Ontario

item.title: Tequila Don Julio 1942
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
Category: Spirits → Tequila

Price: $170.25

Bottle Size: 750 mL

Alcohol Content: 40%

Origin: Mexico (Region Not Specified)

Style: Warm & Toasty

Description

Tequila Don Julio 1942 is a luxury, small-batch tequila created to honour the year Don Julio González began his tequila-making journey. Aged for a minimum of two and a half years, it displays a bright golden amber colour with rich aromas of caramel and chocolate. The palate reveals toasted oak, vanilla, and cooked agave, leading to a long, lingering finish.

Serving Suggestion

Best enjoyed neat in a snifter glass to fully appreciate its depth, smoothness, and craftsmanship.

Availability

In stock at LCBO Alliston, Ontario

item.title: Producer
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
Don Julio

See Products

About the Producer

Don Julio Tequila is a premium tequila brand founded in 1942 by Don Julio González in the highlands of Jalisco, Mexico. With a focus on quality over quantity, Don Julio revolutionized tequila production by prioritizing fully matured blue agave plants and careful, small-batch distillation methods. This commitment helped elevate tequila from a traditional spirit to a globally respected luxury product.

Today, Don Julio is recognized worldwide for its craftsmanship, consistency, and refined flavour profiles. The brand produces a range of tequilas, from fresh and vibrant blancos to smooth, oak-aged expressions, each reflecting the heritage and expertise of Mexican tequila making.

Don Julio tequilas are made using 100% blue agave, harvested at peak maturity to ensure optimal flavour. The agave is slow-cooked and distilled with precision, resulting in a smooth, clean spirit. Depending on the expression, the tequila may be aged in oak barrels, adding complexity and depth while maintaining the natural agave character.

This attention to detail ensures that every bottle delivers balance, quality, and a distinctive taste.

item.title: Database Descriptions
item.dc:creator: Brielle
item.content:encoded:
Stores

The stores table contains data for LCBO retail locations across Ontario. This includes city, address, postal code and geographic coordinates. The LCBO Alliston store was selected from this table and used to create the store information page.

Producers

The producer table stores a list of the companies that manufacture or supply the alcohol products sold by the LCBO. In this project, Don Julio is used as the selected producer, and its information is used to create a producer flyer.

Products

The products table contains detailed information about individual LCBO products. This includes product name, price, alcohol content, bottle size, style, product category, etc. For this project, data such as Don Julio tequila products was taken from this table to create individual product posts.

Categories

The categories table defines the classification of products sold by the LCBO, such as spirits, wine, beer, coolers, etc. These categories help organize products by types.

Inventories

The inventory table tracks which products are available at specific LCBO stores. Instead of using names, the table uses ID numbers to link information across the database. This table was used to determine which Don Julio products are available at the Alliston LCBO location.

item.excerpt:encoded: Displays the latest posts as either the site homepage or as the "Posts page" as defined under reading settings. If it exists, the Front Page template overrides this template when posts are shown on the homepage.
